items.title: Zelensky to speak to Trump after US proposes Russia-Ukraine peace plan
items.description: The plan was reportedly drafted by US and Russian officials, without Ukraine's involvement.

items.title: Bush lauds Dick Cheney as a 'thinker and listener' at funeral
items.description: Cheney died aged 84 from complications of pneumonia and cardiac and vascular disease in early November.

items.title: COP30 climate talks evacuated after fire breaks out
items.description: Thousands of people are attending the UN climate talks in Brazil.

items.title: 'Huge columns of smoke': BBC at the scene of fire at COP30
items.description: Climate Editor Justin Rowlatt was at the UN climate talks in Brazil when a fire broke out.

items.title: Spain's attorney general convicted in controversial leak case
items.description: Álvaro García Ortiz is barred from the post for two years and must pay €10,000 in compensation.
